title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 46.6 - Inpatient hospital and related care
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 46.6 - Inpatient hospital and related care

State Regulations

Reimbursement for inpatient care rendered by hospitals shall be made at all-inclusive per diem rates not to exceed those established by the State of New York Joint Committee on Hospital Rates. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
46.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
